website_summaries.verdict: Cover of the photo album looks great with a simulation of a chalkboard.
pros: Photo album can hold up to 200 photos measuring 4 x 6 inches
Free of all chemicals that could cause damage to your photo prints
Black and white cover has a nice message that looks like it was written on a chalkboard
cons: No sleeve for a photo to be placed on the outer cover

customer_reviews.title: Great albums for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these albums. I am not a scrapbooker. I like to write notes or memories by a photo. This is a perfect.photo album for me. I slide the photo in and in the lined space.beside the picture I can write my notes. I started one for our foster.kids, and I am going to use one for artistic photography, and I have a couple of albums falling apart that I want to rehome the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Terry W-C

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this would be kind of cheap but it was not it was very nice and I was not embarrassed to give it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline M. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Photo Book
customer_reviews.text: I like the chalkboard look. The book is attractive and well made, I love to spaces to date and describe the photo
customer_reviews.author: Linda Paschall Stoltz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used Pioneer albums multiple times in past. A dependable product & arrived as expected & as displayed online.
customer_reviews.author: kha0221

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty, great quality. Plenty of room to write a description in the memo section.
customer_reviews.author: George Moreau

customer_reviews.title: Nice photograph album.  Cover is lovely.  Will probably buy more
customer_reviews.text: I like the photograph album. Will probably buy more. I didn't realize how many photographs I have. Good sale.

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer photo album
customer_reviews.text: Really like this photo album.came in good condition.enough writing space.nice keepsake

customer_reviews.title: Great photo book
customer_reviews.text: Cute photo album. Quality isn’t 100% but I expected that for the price. Overall happy
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design of this photo album but a couple pages inside were loose when it arrived with 1 being separated from the book itself a third of the way down the page
customer_reviews.author: Belle Esprit

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have much room for writing
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't as large as I thought it would be and although it seems well made I didn't think it quite met the reviews I read - it was a gift though and served it's purpose. I probably wouldn't order it for myself as it didn't have much room for writing.
customer_reviews.author: DeEtta L.

customer_reviews.title: vacation picture
customer_reviews.text: i always like to print out pictures from vacation. this now holds pictures from park city Utah.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I love that it has the memo area to jot down your memories.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyfromBama

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful photo album! Definitely worth purchasing! It has my favorite saying on it and butterflies!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa A Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty and has a quality feel to it. Already filled it and it's holding well.

customer_reviews.title: Good picture album.
customer_reviews.text: This item was sturdy and works perfect for my pictures from Savannah and Charleston. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: I still love paper pics
customer_reviews.text: Great gifts! Starting a new photo album for my granddaughter.

customer_reviews.title: Nicew Album
customer_reviews.text: Very nice album with a place to write beside each picture.

customer_reviews.title: Photo Album
customer_reviews.text: Album a bit smaller in size than expected. Otherwise, was fine.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item
customer_reviews.text: My product was bent on the front and back cover, it being a photo album means I can't use this!!

customer_reviews.title: This photo book makes me Happy:)
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this photo album. It is easy to put pictures in place.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is just what I was looking for! quick delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Brush

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivery came on time, its appearance and use are as expected from the photos given.

customer_reviews.title: I
customer_reviews.text: This album worked perfect for the project I used them for
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice. One page has two photo slots and on the sides you can write something. I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Mellanie Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my pictures. Also has a place to write if you wanted to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Ryland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs! I want to save all of my years in college in an album so my pictures arent stuck on my phone any more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this photo album. it was perfect size. The only thing I didn't like is you cant really write nothing in the memo because it is all grayed out. Other then that it was a good album and the pictures slid in really easily.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: She is married with kids of her own so I thought they would love to there Mom as a little girl
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my Daughter i had pictures in a box. She is married with kids of her own so I thought they would love to there Mom as a little girl. and see how she caught fish as a kid just like them. They loved it. What a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected made a perfect b-day present + pictures for my girlfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Schyler Garza

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer brand is the best I have found over the years
customer_reviews.text: Pioneer brand is the best I have found over the years. Other brands tear apart as you put pictures into the sleeves, but not Pioneer! I'm so glad I found this & a few others in the amazon selection. The book cover is a nice texture on its own but also comes with a cover protector which you can use or discard. There is plenty of memo room next to each photo slot (about 1x3 inches).
customer_reviews.author: lcdemar

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty great
customer_reviews.text: As some other reviewers have mentioned, this does have a weird smell when you first receive it. It has since dissipated, which is good. Pictures stay in pretty well, but do sometimes fall towards the center of the album. It's not a huge thing, but it's kind of annoying for me. The plastic is a bit fragile and the part connected to the paper does come apart easily if you aren't being careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Album
customer_reviews.text: I am happily using this album now. I especially like the memo area where you can write down who it is and where you were.
customer_reviews.author: rrjwj

customer_reviews.title: Great photo album.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter graduation. Very high-quality and it holds pictures well.
customer_reviews.author: C Wood

customer_reviews.title: Cute Lightweight Photo Album
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful photo album! Purchased this for a Christmas gift. Seems to be great quality! But I do feel the price is a bit high at $17.99 for this item.
customer_reviews.author: KS6515

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than what you think, but still worth it
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I thought but I still love it it’s perfect. Holds plenty of pictures and nice sized pictures might I add! Plus I love the words printed across the top
customer_reviews.author: Sheilamxe

customer_reviews.title: Gift for granddaughter was a hit.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice album and my 11-year old granddaughter loves it... so... perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Shankland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice photo album, has space for 200 picture. Not flimsy. Well built.

customer_reviews.title: Both loved the albums and what was inside
customer_reviews.text: Got these albums for my daughters in laws on their birthdays and filled them with loads of pics. Both loved the albums and what was inside...
customer_reviews.author: Fred Baetz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and simple. All photo slots are landscape, though, which I didn't realize when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Customer1234

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the design on it. It has lots of spots to put photos into it.

customer_reviews.title: Small photos
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could put small photos in the sleeve so they don't move around. Any ideas?

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice photo album but smelt horrible when I first got it

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cover unglued and it goto mold because of the humidity in PR
customer_reviews.author: Luis Martell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I fill these in no time at all! Im constantly taking pictures!! I love the quality and feel these albums have. The cute saying or design on them add that personalized touch. You can add a memo! Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks

product_meta.title: Pioneer Photo Albums EV-246CHLK/R 200-Pocket Chalkboard Printed Remember Theme Photo Album for 4 by 6-Inch Prints
product_meta.description: This book style photo album features a chalkboard printed cover. It holds 200 photos up to 4"x6" displaying two photos per page in optically clear pockets with shaded paper backgrounds. Each page includes a memo area next to each photo. The book measures 9.125"x8.625"x1.75". Photo Safe: Acid, Lignin and PVC free.
feature_bullets: Photo safe: Acid, lignin and PVC free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars336 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
